entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon.
